file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: |
    Documentation
  version: 1.0.0
  title: 'Coderslab - Davi'
  termsOfService: 'http://swagger.io/terms/'
  contact:
    name: Davi Fonseca
    email: davi.brandao.fonseca@gmail.com
    url: https://github.com/davibrandao18
#  license:
#    name: Apache 2.0
#    url: 'http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html'
tags:
  - name: Subject
    description: everything about subject integration for Coderslab
  - name: Category
    description: everything about category integration for Coderslab
paths:
# Subject
  /subject/create:
    post:
      tags:
        - Subject
      summary: API
      description: Interface de Detalhes dos Pedidos de Compras
      operationId: subject_create
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Subject created
        '403':
          description: Subject already exists
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/subject.Request'
        required: true
  /subject/read/byId/:{id}:
      get:
        summary: Retorna o subject com base em um ID.
        parameters:
          - name: id
            in: path
            required: true
            description: Id do subject gerado pelo MongoDB.
            schema:
              type : string
              format: uuid
              minimum: 1
        tags:
          - Subject
        description: API para retorno do array de subjects
        operationId: subjects_byId
        responses:
          '200':
            description: OK
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/subject_read.Response'
          '404':
            description: Not Found
          '400':
            description: Bad Request
  /subject/read/byLabel/:{label}:
      get:
        summary: Retorna o subject com base em uma Label.
        parameters:
          - name: label
            in: path
            required: true
            description: Rótulo atribuido ao subject.
            schema:
              type : string
              minimum: 1
        tags:
          - Subject
        description: API para retorno do array de subjects
        operationId: subjects_byLabel
        responses:
          '200':
            description: OK
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/subject_read.Response'
          '400':
            description: Bad Request
          '404':
            description: Not Found
  /subject/read/all:
      get:
        tags:
          - Subject
        summary: API
        description: API para retorno do array de subjects
        operationId: subjects_all
        responses:
          '200':
            description: successful operation
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/subject_all.Response'
          '400':
            description: Bad Request
          '404':
            description: Not Found
  /subject/update:
    put:
      tags:
        - Subject
      summary: API
      description: Interface de Detalhes dos Pedidos de Compras
      operationId: subject_update
      responses:
        '204':
          description: Subject updated
        '400':
          description: Bad request
        '403':
          description: Subject label already exists
        '404':
          description: Subject does not exist
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/subject.Request'
        required: true
  /subject/delete/:{id}:
    delete:
      summary: Deleta um subject com base em seu ID.
      parameters:
          - name: id
            in: path
            required: true
            description: Id do subject gerado pelo MongoDB.
            schema:
              type : string
              format: uuid
              minimum: 1
      tags:
        - Subject
      description: Interface de Detalhes dos Pedidos de Compras
      operationId: subject_delete
      responses:
        '204':
          description: Subject deleted
        '400':
          description: Bad request
        '404':
          description: Subject does not exist
# Category
  /category/create:
    post:
      tags:
        - Category
      summary: API
      description: Interface de Detalhes dos Pedidos de Compras
      operationId: category_create
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Subject created
        '403':
          description: Subject already exists
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/subject.Request'
        required: true
  /category/read/byId/:{id}:
      get:
        summary: Retorna o subject com base em um ID.
        parameters:
          - name: id
            in: path
            required: true
            description: Id do subject gerado pelo MongoDB.
            schema:
              type : string
              format: uuid
              minimum: 1
        tags:
          - Category
        description: API para retorno do array de subjects
        operationId: category_byId
        responses:
          '200':
            description: OK
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/subject_read.Response'
          '404':
            description: Not Found
          '400':
            description: Bad Request
  /category/read/all:
      get:
        tags:
          - Category
        summary: API
        description: API para retorno do array de subjects
        operationId: category_all
        responses:
          '200':
            description: successful operation
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/subject_all.Response'
          '400':
            description: Bad Request
          '404':
            description: Not Found
  /category/update:
    put:
      tags:
        - Category
      summary: API
      description: Interface de Detalhes dos Pedidos de Compras
      operationId: category_update
      responses:
        '204':
          description: Subject updated
        '400':
          description: Bad request
        '403':
          description: Subject label already exists
        '404':
          description: Subject does not exist
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/subject.Request'
        required: true
  /category/delete/:{id}:
    delete:
      summary: Deleta um subject com base em seu ID.
      parameters:
          - name: id
            in: path
            required: true
            description: Id do subject gerado pelo MongoDB.
            schema:
              type : string
              format: uuid
              minimum: 1
      tags:
        - Category
      description: Interface de Detalhes dos Pedidos de Compras
      operationId: category_delete
      responses:
        '204':
          description: Subject deleted
        '400':
          description: Bad request
        '404':
          description: Subject does not exist
servers:
# Added by API Auto Mocking Plugin
  - url: 'https://cluster.prod.com.br/coderslab'
    description: Link do cluster produtivo - External URL PRD
components:
  schemas:
    subject.Request:
        title: subject.Request
        description: 'Object for subject'
        type: object
        properties:
          id:
            type: string
            description: 'Id gerado pelo MongoDB'
          label:
            type: string
            description: 'Rotúlo para o assunto Ex: NodeJs'
          categories:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
              description: 'Array de categorias Ex: [Web, Mobile]'

    subject_all.Response:
        title: subject_read_all.Response
        description: 'Array for subjects'
        type: array
        items:
          type: object
          properties:
            id:
              type: string
              description: 'Id gerado pelo MongoDB'
            label:
              type: string
              description: 'Rotúlo para o assunto Ex: NodeJs'
            categories:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string
                description: 'Array de categorias Ex: [Web, Mobile]'

    subject_read.Response:
        title: subject_read.Response
        description: 'Object for subject'
        type: object
        properties:
          id:
            type: string
            description: 'Id gerado pelo MongoDB'
          label:
            type: string
            description: 'Rotúlo para o assunto Ex: NodeJs'
          categories:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
              description: 'Array de categorias Ex: [Web, Mobile]'
